title: Granite Chief
text:
Granite Chief is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Sierra%20Nevada%20%28U.S.%29">Sierra Nevada</a> near <a href="Lake%20Tahoe">Lake Tahoe</a>. The mountain rises to an elevation of and receives consistent heavy snowfall during the winter months.
The summit is the highest point in the <a href="Granite%20Chief%20Wilderness">Granite Chief Wilderness</a> and marks the northwestern boundary of <a href="Palisades%20Tahoe">Palisades Tahoe</a>.
